section.title: Description
section.p: Difficulty in breathing, often associated with lung or heart disease and resulting in shortness of breath. Also called air hunger. [Source: The American Heritage Dictionary of the English Language, Fourth Edition]

stentry.p: Record the date on which the patient was affected by dyspnea.
Indicates whether the patient experienced dyspnea. Possible values are No; Yes; Unknown/not documented; etc.
